INST:
In this task, you will be shown a letter very briefly, and then need to decide which of two options was shown.  In the task, you will first see a fixation mark. Then, very briefly, you will see a letter (for example, 'a'):

                                    a
 
Then, it will be covered with some random characters, such as this:
                           %#*@$

Then, you will need to decide, using the left and right shift keys, which of two options it was:
                      a                     r    
In this case, the correct answer would be to press the left-shift key, because it was an 'a'. Respond as quickly as possible, but try not to make mistakes. Press a shift key to begin.
TAKEABREAK: You may take a short rest. When you are ready to resume, put your fingers on the shift key and press one of them.
FOOTER: Choose response with left and right shift key.
DEBRIEF: This test is complete.  Press any key to continue.
